messages.message: Trying the search feature and found a quite a bit of personal data, prefer not to share the queries used, can someone please DM me and I can point to some files which should not have been indexed, and / or screened for PII information

All the data indexed for the current Search scope comes from our Instabase shared drives which has ‘all employee access’. This includes: Engineering, HR, Enterprise Search(subset of Companies drive). If there are personal data in these drives this is a good opportunity to clean it up. @Mitch Welzen Creating a private thread as well to tackle the ones you found!
